argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.r | |- R = ( RingCat ` U ) |
| 2 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.s | |- S = ( SetCat ` U ) |
| 3 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.b | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.c | |- C = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.u | |- ( ph -> U e. WUni ) |
| 6 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.f | |- ( ph -> F = ( x e. B |-> ( Base ` x ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | funcringcsetcOLD2.g | |- ( ph -> G = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( _I |` ( x RingHom y ) ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> G = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( _I |` ( x RingHom y ) ) ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( x = X /\ y = Y ) -> ( x RingHom y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( x RingHom y ) = ( X RingHom Y ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_reseq2d | |- ( ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( _I |` ( x RingHom y ) ) = ( _I |` ( X RingHom Y ) ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> X e. B ) |
| 13 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> Y e. B ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X RingHom Y ) e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X RingHom Y ) e. _V ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_resiexd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( _I |` ( X RingHom Y ) ) e. _V ) |
| 17 | 8, 11, 12, 13, 16 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( X e. B /\ Y e. B ) ) -> ( X G Y ) = ( _I |` ( X RingHom Y ) ) ) |
